SEARCH

Serialized Form

  • Package gridgames

    • Class gridgames.Game

      class Game extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      3L

      • Serialized Fields

        • bestMove
          int[] bestMove
          Best move the user can choose to gain the highest number of points for the current round, as an array of two int values.
        • difficulty
          Difficulty difficulty
          Current level of difficulty the user is playing on, as a Difficulty enumeration.
        • gameRules
          String gameRules
          String which could contain the game rules.
        • grid
          Grid grid
          Grid object on which this Game and its subclasses can operate on.
        • loseMessage
          String loseMessage
          String which could contain a message to display when the user lost.
        • score
          int score
          Current score made by the user while playing, as an int.
        • scoreInc
          int scoreInc
          Score that the user could make by validating its move, as an int.
        • state
          GameState state
          current state of the game, as a GameState enumeration.
        • winMessage
          String winMessage
          String which could contain a message to display when the user won.

    • Class gridgames.GraphicalView

      class GraphicalView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller
          GameController controller
          GameController instance to get GUI elements from.
        • difficultiesMap
          Map<String,Difficulty> difficultiesMap
          Map to associate specific String options for the user to select in the GraphicalView.difficultyCombo comb-box, to choose specific levels of difficulty Difficulty enumerations.
          See Also:
          • GraphicalView.makeDifficultiesMap()
        • difficultyCombo
          JComboBox<String> difficultyCombo
          JComboBox<String> which contains labels in reference to the different levels of difficulty the user can play with.
        • game
          Game game
          Game instance to read information on and/or to interact with.
        • gamePanel
          gridgames.GraphicalView.GamePanel gamePanel
          GamePanel instance holding the tiles to display.
        • hintCol
          int hintCol
          Column index of the best move, as an int.
        • hintRow
          int hintRow
          Row index of the best move, as an int.
        • inputTextArea
          JTextArea inputTextArea
          JTextArea to display instructions if the GameController as a fully implemented GameController.makeTextArea(int, int).
        • scoreLabel
          JLabel scoreLabel
          JLabel to display the current score.

    • Class gridgames.Grid

      class Grid extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      2L

      • Serialized Fields

        • height
          int height
          The height of this this Grid, mostly used for bound chrecking and displaying.
        • nSelectedTiles
          int nSelectedTiles
          Number of selected Tile objects.
        • tilesArray
          List<List<Tile>> tilesArray
          The Tile objects on which this Grid can interact with.
        • width
          int width
          The width of this this Grid, mostly used for bound chrecking and displaying.

    • Class gridgames.SameGame

      class SameGame extends Game implements Serializable

    • Class gridgames.Tile

      class Tile extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • isSelected
          boolean isSelected
          Flag marking this Tile object to have been selected by the user or not, as a boolean. Always false when instanciating a Tile object.
        • value
          int value
          Value of this Tile object, as an int.
